entry.source: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,67}{F813,1,403002}Being a Hunter seems to be a popular{F801}occupation with the young ones.{F801}{F802}I mean, I'm a Hunter myself.{F801}It's not that I don't like it...{F801}{F802}But, I just feel... that it'd be{F801}better if we weren't in a situation{F801}where Hunters had to exist.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Confident woman\0{F87A,80}{F813,1,404401}How could a frail woman like me come{F801}all this way?{F801}{F802}Well, not even the Ring of Gaea{F801}members can resist my feminine{F801}charms.{F801}{F802}But I'm nothing compared to Lady{F801}Yuriko, though...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Confident woman\0{F87A,80}{F813,1,404431}I've thought back on Lady Yuriko's{F801}beauty, and I've reached a conclusion.{F801}{F802}Strength isn't all about muscular{F801}power. That is the real power.{F801}
